name: mistranscription
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a mistake made when writing down something that has been said or sung, or when changing something into a different written form : There were several mistranscriptions of consonants.
[ U ] the fact of making a mistake or mistakes when writing down something that has been said or sung, or when changing something into a different written form: Some of the structural forms in the data reflect possible mistranscription errors. There were problems with data mis-transcription from sources in the literature. Related words
transcription
mistranscribe
More examplesFewer examplesThe number of mistranscriptions did not increase when noise was added.There are several mistranscriptions in the passage containing Greek words. He assembled a catalogue of misunderstandings, misinterpretations, and mis-transcriptions.
